body_html: The note only talks about input though. It should have nothing to do with how your function is implemented. All you need to make sure is that the input used in gradcheck don't have overlapping storage.

body: The note only talks about input though. It should have nothing to do with how your function is implemented. All you need to make sure is that the input used in gradcheck don't have overlapping storage.
